name: The Sh!t$
description:
A farcical take on 2020 for the GMTKJam.

Try to save a town descending into an absolute sh!t storm. As more people enter the town and engage with each other, the situation gets more and more out of control. 

CONTROLS:

  • WASD/Arrow to move the Camera View
  • Click to send sickies to the hospital
  • Click to redirect healthies 
  • Double click piles to clean them up
  • Once infected, you have 60 seconds to get the sickies to the hospital before they sh!t the bed... 

SIMULATION SETTINGS:

  • Adjust how fast your people move
  • Manipulate the settings to change the ratios of sick/healthy
  • Increase the total population

The counters will let you know how many sickies, healthies, and deaths you have in your town.

Good luck!
